info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 8:29PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EFFINGHAM, HAMPTON AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 829 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Gillisonville, or 7 miles north of Ridgeland, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Ridgeland, Grahamville, Ebenezer, Coosawhatchie, Tarboro, Grays, Stillwell and Switzerland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
